parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater core can cause antifreeze fumes to seep into the vehicle, making it difficult to drive, and can also lead to reduced visibility due to fogging of windows, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: steam escaping into the passenger compartment
hot coolant leaking into the passenger compartment
sudden loss of visibility due to steam and antifreeze covering the windshield and side windows.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear windshield defogger can cause the rear windshield to shatter, reducing visibility and increasing the risk of accidents.
The failure of the throttle linkage can cause sudden acceleration, loss of control, and stuck accelerator pedals, which can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The accelerator pedal becomes stuck in the up position

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater core can cause coolant to leak into the passenger compartment, resulting in burns to the driver and passengers, fogging of the windshield, and creating a hazardous driving condition.
symptoms: dripping on carpet by driver's feet

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater core connection lines can cause hot coolant to leak onto the driver's feet, resulting in burns, and creating a hazardous driving condition.
symptoms: mild burns to driver or passengers.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the valve cover gasket can cause engine oil leaks, leading to engine damage, stalling, and potentially causing accidents.
